description.value:
10 hours of air, can replace air tankwithout removing suit. Counts as AP 4 Head AP 3 Else. Has Vox, Seal patcher, grapnel + 10m of line,and photo-visor. -10 Agility when wearing. Breached if taking more than 2xAP damage, can be repaired as Full Action with tape, patches, etc)

Requirements

Some suits allow for movement 6 in zero or low gravity. Effected by armour craftmanship rules.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
